venue.name: Roots and Wings Yoga and Healing ArtsCenter

item.description:
April’s FREE Community Evenings, our gift to you:


New Possibilities for Feeling Good!
 (this event will also be available on April 6th, at Earthsong Yoga in Marlborough; see calendar)

How would you like a mini-retreat focused fully on feeling good? Who wouldn’t?!

Then join us, and let Ann guide you through three transformative, relaxing, feeling-good meditations. We’ll deeply relax. We’ll dream and create. We’ll remember happy times. We’ll appreciate. And we’ll connect to expanding love.

Our intention is to help you deeply relax, let go of your tension and stress, and to leave feeling soaked up with love, appreciation, and good thoughts.

Sound good? If so, join us, and invite your friends and family to join us, too!

“Ann was wonderful! I came into the room after the rush of the day and was immediately at peace. Her calm, focused and patient nature was so welcoming. I am still using the techniques taught at this gathering. They have helped me react with purpose. I'm very grateful to Ann for sharing her time and knowledge.” Linda M.

So treat yourself to this wonderful free event for you. Please invite others to sign up and join you. Share this with your friends, family and groups. The class is appropriate for everyone, and all are welcome!

Space is limited, so registration is required.

Please be considerate. If your plans change, please, please let us know as soon as possible so we won't be waiting for you.

Please plan on arriving around 7:05 to get settled. No need to bring anything, unless you want to.  Chairs, yoga mats, pillows and yoga blankets are available there.

Hope you'll join us!

Ann

Class leader: Ann Ide, M.A., spiritual life coach with www.newpossibilitiescoaching.com, certified master practitioner in Neuro-linguistic Programming and Hypnotherapy, and certified NLP Life Coach. Ann coaches people to move beyond struggles and mere survival, to new levels of harmony, happiness and success. With her expert questioning, inner exploration processes and personal change interventions, clients become emotionally and spiritually aligned to more easily create the happiness they want.

This public event is co-sponsored by Roots and Wings Healing Arts Center and New Possibilities Coaching as a community service.


Thank you to Roots and Wings for co-sponsoring these public service events with us! Check out all the programs and healing practitioners they offer for your health and well-being! We love them!

www.RootsandWingsHealingArts.com
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be downstairs in the Roots studio (either come in back door of bldg. or go down stairs towards back of first floor)

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: New Possibilities for Feeling Good! Free community evening of guided meditations
